Schema: {"typeName":"Redis::Cloud::Peering","description":"CloudFormation template for Subscription Peering.","tagging":{"taggable":false},"typeConfiguration":{"properties":{"RedisAccess":{"$ref":"#/definitions/RedisAccess"}},"additionalProperties":false,"required":["RedisAccess"]},"definitions":{"RedisAccess":{"description":"Properties needed to access Redis.","type":"object","properties":{"xapikey":{"description":"x_api_key","type":"string"},"xapisecretkey":{"description":"x_api_secret_key","type":"string"}},"additionalProperties":false}},"properties":{"PeeringID":{"type":"string","description":"The ID of the Subscription Peering.","default":"Overwrite this value"},"BaseUrl":{"type":"string","description":"[Required]. The Base URL where the API calls are sent."},"SubscriptionID":{"type":"string","description":"[Required]. The ID of the Pro Subscription that will make a peering connection. Example: 163199"},"Provider":{"type":"string","description":"[Optional]. Cloud provider. Example: AWS. Default: 'AWS'","default":""},"Region":{"type":"string","description":"[Required for AWS]. Deployment region as defined by cloud provider. Example: us-east-1"},"AwsAccountId":{"type":"string","description":"[Required for AWS]. AWS Account uid. Example: 178919255286"},"VpcId":{"type":"string","description":"[Required for AWS]. VPC uid. Example: vpc-00e1a8cdca658ce8c"},"VpcCidr":{"type":"string","description":"[Optional]. VPC CIDR. Example:  '10.10.10.0/24'"},"VpcCidrs":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string"},"insertionOrder":true,"description":"[Optional]. List of VPC CIDRs. Example: '[10.10.10.0/24,10.10.20.0/24]'"},"VpcProjectUid":{"type":"string","description":"[Required for GCP]. VPC project uid."},"VpcNetworkName":{"type":"string","description":"[Required for GCP]. VPC network name."}},"handlers":{"create":{"permissions":["cloudformation:RegisterType","cloudformation:SetTypeDefaultVersion","cloudformation:PublishType","cloudformation:DescribeTypeRegistration","cloudformation:DeregisterType","s3:GetObject","s3:PutObject","logs:CreateLogGroup","logs:CreateLogStream","logs:PutLogEvents"]},"read":{"permissions":["cloudformation:RegisterType","cloudformation:SetTypeDefaultVersion","cloudformation:PublishType","cloudformation:DescribeTypeRegistration","cloudformation:DeregisterType","s3:GetObject","s3:PutObject","logs:CreateLogGroup","logs:CreateLogStream","logs:PutLogEvents"]},"update":{"permissions":["cloudformation:RegisterType","cloudformation:SetTypeDefaultVersion","cloudformation:PublishType","cloudformation:DescribeTypeRegistration","cloudformation:DeregisterType","s3:GetObject","s3:PutObject","logs:CreateLogGroup","logs:CreateLogStream","logs:PutLogEvents"]},"delete":{"permissions":["cloudformation:RegisterType","cloudformation:SetTypeDefaultVersion","cloudformation:PublishType","cloudformation:DescribeTypeRegistration","cloudformation:DeregisterType","s3:GetObject","s3:PutObject","logs:CreateLogGroup","logs:CreateLogStream","logs:PutLogEvents"]},"list":{"permissions":["cloudformation:RegisterType","cloudformation:SetTypeDefaultVersion","cloudformation:PublishType","cloudformation:DescribeTypeRegistration","cloudformation:DeregisterType","s3:GetObject","s3:PutObject","logs:CreateLogGroup","logs:CreateLogStream","logs:PutLogEvents"]}},"additionalProperties":false,"required":["SubscriptionID"],"createOnlyProperties":["/properties/BaseUrl","/properties/Provider","/properties/Region","/properties/AwsAccountId","/properties/VpcId","/properties/VpcProjectUid","/properties/VpcNetworkName"],"readOnlyProperties":["/properties/PeeringID"],"primaryIdentifier":["/properties/PeeringID"]}
